article_title: Undercover Tourist Tax Spies In Greece, Then Private Bounty Hunters For IRS

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: Greece wants to form an army of tax inspectors to rat out tax cheats. Tourists, nannies, students, or anyone could be on surveillance duty. America's IRS could be emboldened even more to roll out private debt collectors.
